StructuresDialog Class Reference

#include <strucdlg.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

c_des: Class StructuresDialog. c_des: This class is used to show a structures dialog. When a file is loaded, all structures are drawn on the screen. c_des: It's also possible to view the structures seperately. Select one of the structures and click Ok to view this structure.
